title: Brushed type of font
content:
Hi, I'm trying to identify the font used in this image, where it says : "Republique ? Non Mais Allo quoi !!!"

It's a nice font of the brushed kind, but not too grunge ! with a special Q ending.

Thanks for helping me out !
